properties.title: Running a TestPlan

section.name: Running a TestPlan
section.p: Once you have a TestPlan configured the way you want it, running it is as simple as selecting Run->Start from JMeter's menu. To stop, choose Run->Stop from the menu.

While JMeter is running, you can select any visualizers you've added to watch the results while samples are collected. You can flip between visualizers to get different views of the data. Visualizers can be cleared of all current data via the Run->Clear menu option.
